name: Illusion (itch) (OuterStudios)
description:
Hello in the Ultimate Game Jam i was required to create a game in seven days the theme Decay. Here is the end result there will be a lot more as i really enjoyed the project yes it is rushed but i can take more time in the future!!! Thanks everyone for playing :) Hope you enjoy. 

I do not have controls as of yet so i have put the player in a learning environment to move at his or her own pace.
